question: Union Ministry of Health and Family Welfare launched the Mission Parivar Vikas with an aim to bring down the Total Fertility Rate to _ by the year 2025.
explanation: The Union Ministry of Health and Family Welfare launched Mission Parivar Vikas with an aim to reach the replacement level fertility goals of 2.1 by 2025‚Äù. The main objective of this initiative will be on improving access to contraceptives through delivering assured services, dovetailing with new promotional schemes, ensuring commodity security, building capacity (service providers), creating an enabling environment along with close monitoring and implementation.
